General.Name: Eversafe Rubber Bhd
General.Description: Eversafe Rubber Berhad, an investment holding company, develops, manufactures, and distributes tyre retreading materials to tyre retreaders and rubber material traders. The company offers masterbatches, pre-cured tread liners, camelbacks, cushion gums, repair ropes, sidewall veneers, and orbitreads. It is also involved in the tyre retreading operations and provision of after-sales services. In addition, the company trades in rubber-based products, equipment, curing envelopes, flaps and tubes, related machineries, rubber wastages sold as scrap, and related accessories. Eversafe Rubber Berhad sells its products in various, including Asia, Australia, Oceania, Africa, the Americas, Europe, and the Middle East. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Ipoh, Malaysia.
